title: Arrays
concept: This level teaches how to declare, input and iterate through arrays in Java. Concepts include summation, max/min, searching, counting, reversing, sorting and frequency.

challenges.title: Sum of Array
challenges.description: Read N and then N integers into array. Print their sum.

challenges.title: Maximum Element
challenges.description: Print the maximum number in array.

challenges.title: Minimum Element
challenges.description: Print the minimum number in array.

challenges.title: Search Element
challenges.description: Read N array elements & X. Print Yes if X is present else No.

challenges.title: Count Occurrences
challenges.description: Print count of how many times X occurs in array.

challenges.title: Sum of Even Numbers
challenges.description: Sum only the even numbers in array.

challenges.title: Reverse Print
challenges.description: Print array elements in reverse order separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Second Largest
challenges.description: Find the second largest distinct element.

challenges.title: Sorted or Not
challenges.description: If array is sorted in non-decreasing order print Yes, else No.

challenges.title: Digit Frequency (0–9)
challenges.description: Given N digits (0–9), count frequency of each digit and print in 10 lines: d:count for 0 to 9.
